description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $360.3K
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with Tri Wave Construction. The average
  contract duration was 0.24 years, and the average contract value
  (not including contracts under $10k) was $144.8K. The longest
  contract was 2.84 years. The largest contract by value (including
  amendments) was $1.5M.
